title: Goats’ cheese ravioli, spiced cauliflower and quails’ eggs with a caper and sultana dressing
description: Creamy goats’ cheese encased in soft pasta served with nutty roast cauliflower and a sweet and salty dressing. There are quite a few steps to this dish, but they are definitely worth it.Equipment: You will need a fluted pasta cutter.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for cooking
1 head purple cauliflower, broken into florets
salt and freshly ground black pepper
20g/¾oz golden raisins, soaked in warm water and drained
½ tbsp finely chopped flatleaf parsley.
nasturtium leaves and flowers, to garnish
